calc.text: INT x:[1,1 / sqrt(2)]. sqrt(1 - x ^ 2) / x ^ 2
INT u:[pi / 2,pi / 4]. sqrt(1 - sin(u) ^ 2) * cos(u) / sin(u) ^ 2

calc._latex_reason: Trig identities: \(\sqrt{(1 - \sin^{2}u)} = \sqrt{(\cos^{2}u)}\); Method : powers of sin to powers of cos.
Trig identities: \(\cos^{2}u = 1 - \sin^{2}u\); Method : powers of cos to powers of sin.
Trig identities: \(\sin^{-2}u = \csc^{2}u\); Method : negative sin-cos-tan powers to csc-sec-cot.
Trig identities: \(1 - \cos^{2}x = \sin^{2}x\); Method : powers of cos to powers of sin.
Trig identities: \(1 + \cos{(2 x)} = -\sin^{2}x + \cos^{2}x + 1\); Method : reduce double angles.
Trig identities: \(-\sin^{2}x = \cos^{2}x - 1\); Method : powers of sin to powers of cos.

calc.text: (-1/3) * pi * cot(pi / 3) + 1/4 * pi * cot(pi / 4) + (INT x:[pi / 4,pi / 3]. cot(x))
(-1/3) * pi * cot(pi / 3) + 1/4 * pi * cot(pi / 4) + (INT x:[pi / 4,pi / 3]. cot(x))

calc._latex_reason: Trig identities: \(\cot{(x)} = \frac{\cos{(x)}}{\sin{(x)}}\); Method : tan-cot to sin-cos ratio.
calc.text: (-1/3) * pi * cot(pi / 3) + 1/4 * pi * cot(pi / 4) + (INT x:[pi / 4,pi / 3]. cos(x) / sin(x))

calc._latex_reason: Integrate by parts, \(u = e^{2 x}, v = \sin{(x)}\).
calc.text: ([sin(x) * exp(2 * x)]_x=0,pi / 2) - (INT x:[0,pi / 2]. 2 * sin(x) * exp(2 * x))

calc._latex_reason: Integrate by parts, \(u = e^{2 x}, v = -\cos{(x)}\).
By solving equation: \(\int_{0}^{\pi/2} \cos{(x)} e^{2 x} \,\mathrm{dx} = -2 + e^{\pi} - 4 * \int_{0}^{\pi/2} \cos{(x)} e^{2 x} \,\mathrm{dx}\)
Trig identities: \(\sin^{2}x = \frac{1}{2} - \frac{\cos{(2 x)}}{2}\); Method : expand products of sin-cos to sums.
By solving equation: \(\int_{0}^{1} e^{u} \sin{(u)} \,\mathrm{du} = 1 + -\cos{(1)} * e + \sin{(1)} * e - \int_{0}^{1} e^{u} \sin{(u)} \,\mathrm{du}\)
Integrate by parts, \(u = \log{(x)}, v = x\).Integrate by parts, \(u = -\log{(x)}, v = x\).
